title: P.T [PS4.PSN.EU] [PKG]
description:
Game Title:  P.T. (Silent Hills)
Platform:    PS4/PSN
Genre:       Horror
Region:      EUR / REGION FREE
Language:    English / MULTI


This is the complete P.T. (Silent Hills teaser) game, in .pkg format, that
hopefully in the future, with some tool/mod/emulator, you'll
be able to install directly on your PS4/Play in a emulator.

Though it's not possible to install it right now, there's
a way to install it IF you downloaded the EU ver. of P.T.
before in which you use a program and a proxy to trick
the PS4 to downloading the .pkg when trying to redownload
P.T.

You can find a tutorial on doing that here: <a href="
https://www.cheapassgamer.com/topic/341858-how-to-download-games-faster-by-using-your-pc/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://www.cheapassgamer.com/topic/341858-how-to-download-games-faster-by-using-your-pc/</a>

---


So...it seems that a lot of problems have come
up at Konami, with the departure of Hideo Kojima and other
major staff to the cancellation of Silent Hills...

All sorts of unfortunate, and what's more unfortunate
is the unknown future of Konami...but understandable for
all the bad decisions/management that's been happening there.

But forcefully removing P.T. from PSN store, making it not available
to anyone to play/download ever again (unless it's already on their
systems) even to those who have downloaded it before is just plain wrong.

It CAN'T be found anywhere in retail format as it doesn't
exist in any physical form, thus it's erased altogether
everywhere AND worse is that Konami is going against those
who have the game on their PS4 and delisting anyone who's selling it on eBay.

Who knows what they'll do next to those who still have the game.
...

But with thanks to those who've found a way to download the
game directly, I was able to and thankfully found a copy of this
game (only the EU) and thus prevent the complete erasure of this game.

With this copy of the EU Version of the game, it can live on
and in the future when the PS4 is jailbroken/emulated/etc, this
game can then be played! (That or using the method if possible).

SPREAD THIS AROUND!
FEEL FREE TO UPLOAD IT ANYWHERE!
SEED FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN FOR EVERYONE!

That is all and game on!
